title: Ticket #7317: holding all jobs in a factory should pause the factory
description: when you use condor_hold to hold all of the jobs in a late-materialization cluster, that should also pause materialization, but it does not. The reason for this is that the Schedd adds a clause to the constraint expression that causes it to never match the cluster ad. A similar modification to the constraint expression for condor_rm and condor_release accounts for the cluster ad, but for some reason the modification for hold does not. This is probably the result of a bad merge, but in any case, the fix is to make the expression modification for hold be the same as the one for release.
